translations.translation: and at the mountains - how they were embedded?
And the mountains, how they were fixed;
And the mountains: how they were fixed?
how the mountains are set firm,
And the mountains – how they have been established?
And at the mountains, how they are rooted
And the mountains, how they are firmly fixed,
how the mountains were hoisted,
And the hills, how they are set up?
and on the mountains, how they are firmly set up,
And at the mountains, how they are rooted?
and the mountains, how they have been set?
And at the Mountains, how they are fixed firm?-
And at the mountains, how they are rooted and fixed firm?
and how the mountains were firmly fixed?
And at the mountains—how they are installed?
And at the mountains - how they are erected?
[88:19] And the mountains, how they were set?
(And the hills, how they are set up) on earth, unmoved?

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَإِلَىٰ ٱلْجِبَالِ كَيْفَ نُصِبَتْ } معناه رُفِعَتْ { وَإِلَى ٱلأَرْضِ كَيْفَ سُطِحَتْ } معناه بُسِطَتْ

translations.translation: And His saying, {And to the mountains, how they are erected} [means] they are raised up. {And to the earth, how it is spread out} [means] it is spread out.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَإِلَىٰ ٱلْجِبَالِ } الرواسي { كَيْفَ نُصِبَتْ } [الغاشية: 19] على وجه الأرض مشتملة على معادن ومياه وأجسام
